mapper.select: select *from productSelect order by productSelect_num asc
select count(*) from productEach where product_num=#{product_num}
select count(*) from productEach where product_num=#{product_num} and PRODUCTEACH_EACH=0

select * from (select rownum r, z.* from (select DISTINCT (PRODUCTINFO_PRICE*(100-productInfo_saleRate)/100) realPrice,t.*,pi.PRODUCTINFO_PRICE,pi.PRODUCTINFO_SALERATE,pc.PRODUCTPIC_PIC from (select count(b.BUY_NUM) c,p.PRODUCT_NUM,p.PRODUCT_NAME from product p LEFT OUTER JOIN buy b on b.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM group by p.PRODUCT_NUM, p.PRODUCT_NAME) t , PRODUCTINFO pi,PRODUCTEACH pe,PRODUCTPIC pc, kind k,PRODUCTKIND pk where pc.PRODUCT_NUM = t.PRODUCT_NUM and pe.PRODUCT_NUM = t.PRODUCT_NUM and pi.PRODUCT_NUM = t.PRODUCT_NUM and pk.KIND_NUM = k.KIND_NUM and pk.PRODUCT_NUM = t.PRODUCT_NUM
and k.productSelect_num = #{productParamDTO.productSelect_num}
and pi.productInfo_saleRate not in (0)
and UPPER(pe.PRODUCTEACH_COLOR) in
UPPER(#{item})
and UPPER(pk.kind_num) in
UPPER(#{item})
and UPPER(pe.PRODUCTsize_size) in
UPPER(#{item})
order by t.c desc,t.product_num desc
order by realPrice asc
order by realPrice desc
order by t.PRODUCT_NUM desc
) z) where r between #{pageMaker.startRowNum} and #{pageMaker.lastLowNum}

select count(t.product_num) from (select DISTINCT p.PRODUCT_NUM,p.PRODUCT_NAME,pk.KIND_NUM,pi.PRODUCTINFO_PRICE,pi.PRODUCTINFO_SALERATE,pi.PRODUCTINFO_SEARCHWORD from PRODUCT p,PRODUCTINFO pi,PRODUCTKIND pk ,PRODUCTSIZE ps, PRODUCTEACH pe,KIND k where pe.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM and pi.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM and pk.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM and ps.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM and ps.PRODUCTSIZE_SIZE = pe.PRODUCTSIZE_SIZE and pk.KIND_NUM = k.KIND_NUM
and k.productSelect_num = #{productParamDTO.productSelect_num}
and pi.productInfo_saleRate not in (0)
and UPPER(pe.PRODUCTEACH_COLOR) in
UPPER(#{item})
and UPPER(pk.kind_num) in
UPPER(#{item})
and UPPER(ps.PRODUCTsize_size) in
UPPER(#{item})
) t

SELECT DISTINCT p.PRODUCT_NUM,p.PRODUCT_NAME,pi.PRODUCTINFO_PRICE,pi.PRODUCTINFO_SALERATE,pi.PRODUCTINFO_SEARCHWORD,pc.productPic_pic ,pk.KIND_NUM FROM PRODUCT p , PRODUCTINFO pi ,PRODUCTKIND pk,productPic pc where pc.product_num = p.product_num and pi.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM and pk.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM and pk.PRODUCT_NUM = pi.PRODUCT_NUM and p.PRODUCT_NUM=#{product_num}

select distinct ps.productSize_size from product p,productSize ps,productEach pe where p.product_num = ps.product_num and p.product_num = pe.product_num and p.product_num = #{product_num} and pe.productEach_each not in (0)

select DISTINCT pe.PRODUCTEACH_COLOR,pe.PRODUCTEACH_EACH from PRODUCT p, PRODUCTSIZE ps, PRODUCTEACH pe where pe.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM and ps.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM and ps.PRODUCT_NUM = pe.PRODUCT_NUM and ps.PRODUCTSIZE_SIZE = pe.PRODUCTSIZE_SIZE and p.PRODUCT_NUM = #{product_num} and ps.PRODUCTSIZE_SIZE = #{productSize_size} and pe.productEach_each not in (0)
select DISTINCT count(ps.productSize_size) from product p, PRODUCTSIZE ps where ps.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM and ps.PRODUCT_NUM = #{product_num} and ps.PRODUCTSIZE_SIZE=upper(#{productSize_size})

select * from (select ROWNUM r,t.* from (select count(b.product_num) sel_count,p.PRODUCT_NUM,p.PRODUCT_NAME,pi.productInfo_price,pi.PRODUCTINFO_SALERATE,pi.PRODUCTINFO_BRAND,pc.productPic_pic from PRODUCT p,productinfo pi, BUY b,PRODUCTPIC pc where pc.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM and p.PRODUCT_NUM = b.PRODUCT_NUM and pi.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM group by b.PRODUCT_NUM, pi.productInfo_price, pi.PRODUCTINFO_SALERATE,pi.PRODUCTINFO_BRAND,pc.productPic_pic, p.PRODUCT_NUM, p.PRODUCT_NAME ORDER BY sel_count desc,p.PRODUCT_NUM desc) t)where r between 0 and 9
select product_num from product where product_num = #{product_num}

select pe.PRODUCTEACH_EACH from PRODUCT p,PRODUCTEACH pe,PRODUCTSIZE ps where pe.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM and ps.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM and ps.PRODUCTSIZE_SIZE = pe.PRODUCTSIZE_SIZE and p.PRODUCT_NUM = #{product_num} and ps.PRODUCTSIZE_SIZE =#{productSize_size} and pe.PRODUCTEACH_COLOR =#{productEach_color}

select DISTINCT pk.KIND_NUM from PRODUCT p , PRODUCTKIND pk,kind k where pk.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM and pk.KIND_NUM = k.KIND_NUM and pk.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM
and k.PRODUCTSELECT_NUM = #{productSelect_num}

select * from (select rownum r, z.* from (select DISTINCT t.*,pi.PRODUCTINFO_PRICE,pi.PRODUCTINFO_SALERATE from (select count(b.BUY_NUM) c,p.PRODUCT_NUM,p.PRODUCT_NAME from product p LEFT OUTER JOIN buy b on b.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM group by p.PRODUCT_NUM, p.PRODUCT_NAME) t , PRODUCTINFO pi,PRODUCTEACH pe, kind k,PRODUCTKIND pk where pe.PRODUCT_NUM = t.PRODUCT_NUM and pi.PRODUCT_NUM = t.PRODUCT_NUM and pk.KIND_NUM = k.KIND_NUM and pk.PRODUCT_NUM = t.PRODUCT_NUM and pi.productInfo_saleRate not in(0) order by t.product_num desc
) z) where PRODUCT_NAME like #{find} and r between #{pageMaker.startRowNum} and #{pageMaker.lastLowNum}
select count(*) from PRODUCT where product_name like #{find}
